name: The Sentinel Hill Stone [Erweiterung]
physical_description: A smooth, black river stone, about the size of a human heart. It is always warm to the touch, even in freezing temperatures. It is covered in deeply engraved, star-shaped glyphs.
history: Found by a farmer near Sentinel Hill after a meteor shower in 1922. He sold it to an antique dealer, claiming it gave him nightmares.

mechanics.skill_check: Archaeology or Occult to identify the glyphs as non-terrestrial.
mechanics.effect: Holding the stone for more than a minute induces vivid, disturbing dreams of a vast, dead city under a black sun during the next sleep.

content_summary: The stone is a psychic resonator, a fragment of a much larger object that fell from the sky.
